review: I got this Chomecast device for my birthday and I love gagets. I have to say though that other than using it for You Tube or Netflix, it's about worthless. There are times that it does a bit more but not without restoring it to its default each time. Opening up the Chromecast will tell you that it is ready to use but nothing but errors follow as you try to cast anything. Changing networks would seem simple enough but again you will have errors until you restore to its default to evey try to get it to work. Sometimes I can use it to cast pictures on my TV from my android tablet but mostly it will not do it as it does not see the device. Lots and lots of errors on this thing when you want to do the simplest task. Unless they can do a firmware update, this is worthless for me. I hardly ever use You Tube, and although I do use Netflix, I have other devices that are more reliable than this and easier to use. I would not recomend this device unless you want another headache.
